content: I think I'll keep the gift a surprise. I'll reach out to my roommate and suggest getting together for dinner or coffee, and then present the gift when we meet up. I'll make sure to choose a quiet and intimate setting where we can catch up and celebrate his son's achievement. Thanks for the advice! By the way, since we're on the topic of celebrations, I was thinking of asking my cousin's daughter for an update on her college applications. Do you think I should reach out to her via email or give her a call?
